ygData.subject: Re: Possilbe Diamond dust solution.
ygData.msgSnippet: This has been brought up before, as well as a NPC that might do it, but a diamond is so hard to get no one want to test it. since this thing has 4 slots mabey
ygData.messageBody:
This has been brought up before, as well as a NPC that
might do it, but a diamond is so hard to get no one
want to test it. since this thing has 4 slots mabey 4
diamond shards?

--- Michael Coughlan <bonaparte@...> wrote:
> If you give scrap metal to Sanfyrd Featherhead (the
> gnome outside the mines of malfunction) you may
> possilbe get "Timmerman's Fabulous Compacter " Its a
> container that hold four items and has a combine
> button. If you ask Sanfryd about the compactor he
> says 'I don't know. It is in fine condition. I
> never heard of any tinkerer named Tinmizer. At least
> you can hold items with it. Just do not press the
> activation button unless you know what you are
> doing.'
> Since compactors crush things... could it work?
>
> (Please note I'm only level 13 and have neight the
> compactor or a diamond to try this out on. i read
> about this on www.everlore.com)
>
> Mten
> 13th warrior
> Fennin Ro
>
>
>
